bestBuyCondition.SERVICE_NAME:
SELECT A.*, B.min_price, B.slope
FROM coin_slope_stats A
INNER JOIN
( SELECT code , date , time , cur_price as min_price , static_slope as slope
FROM coin
WHERE code = 'KRW-BTC'
AND str_to_date(concat(date,time),'%Y%m%d%H%i%s') >= date_add(now(), interval -2 hour)
ORDER BY cur_price
LIMIT 0,1 ) B
ON A.code = B.code
AND A.date = B.date
AND A.time = B.time
WHERE A.code = 'KRW-BTC'
AND str_to_date(concat(A.date,A.time),'%Y%m%d%H%i%s') >= date_add(now(), interval -2 hour)
